summary: It takes a father and son team to battle the forces of evil throughout China, fighting with honor to defend the weak through fast-motion kung fu.
cast: Jet Li|Chingmy Yau|Deannie Ip|Miu Tse|Sung Young Chen|Chunhua Ji|Damian Lau|Lung Wei Wang|Chu-Ko Liang|Jiankui Sun|Jing Wong|Bing Lei Li|Michelle Ruff|Eric Tsang
title: Hung Hei Kwun: Siu Lam ng zou
